name: Vitamin C Cream
description: Revitalizing Anti-Aging Cream enriched with Vitamin C. This powerful cream helps to brighten the skin, reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and improve overall skin texture.

keyIngredients.name: Vitamin C
keyIngredients.description: Brightens skin and reduces signs of aging.

name: Makeup Melt
description: Essential makeup-removing necessities to kick off your cleansing routine. Effectively dissolves all traces of makeup, leaving your skin feeling fresh and clean.

name: Aloevera Cream
description: Hydrating aloe vera cream for glowing skin. Infused with natural aloe vera extracts, this cream provides deep hydration, soothes irritation, and promotes a healthy, radiant complexion.

name: Skincare Cream
description: Luxurious Hydration Cream designed to provide intense moisture and nourishment to your skin. With a rich, creamy texture, it helps to improve skin elasticity and smoothness, leaving your skin feeling soft and supple.
